roleset.name: assign a label or attribute

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Her recent report reclassifies the stock as a ``hold.''

roleset.note: RECLASSIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reclassify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 29.2, other framed members include count, define, describe, employ, establish, intend, portray, rank, recommend, redefine, regard, treat. Comparison with define. (from reclassify.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: make/keep secret

example.name: in honor of the FBI goons
